description:
Unable to watch as Piccolo is overwhelmed by Frieza, Gohan springs into action!  Meanwhile, Vegeta devises a risky plan for transforming himself into a Super Saiyan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freeza tem a batalha ganha com sua terceira transformaçã
Kyoufu Shiro!! Freezer wa 3 Do no Henshin de Shoubu Suru
ความน่ากลัวของแท้ ฟรีสเซอร์แปลงร่างครั้งที่ 3
恐怖しろ!! フリーザは3度の変身で勝負する
